# Toast Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Filled

**Variants:**

| Variant Name | Class |
|--------------|-------|
| Default | `toast-container  toast ` |
| Success | `toast-container  toast toast-success ` |
| Info | `toast-container  toast toast-info ` |
| Warning | `toast-container  toast toast-warning ` |
| Error | `toast-container  toast toast-error ` |
